column3:
• The balance of abrasiveness, softness and longevity make pumice stone a perfect natural alternative that will keep your feet soft and supple. A natural pumice stone will not wear out and can be soaked in hot, soapy water overnight for cleaning. It works far better than synthetic pumice, which is commonly seen on foot files and brushes.

  • A definite must have for your foot care collection.
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Cosmetic Tools > Skin Care Tools > Foot Files

column3:
Supporting and actively engaging with the Indigenous community held significant importance in the life of Milissa's mother, whose legacy inspired the establishment of SPIRIT BEAUTY. At SPIRIT BEAUTY, we remain committed to upholding this legacy by continuing to support and empower the Indigenous community. We take pride in allocating 10% of all profits towards organizations such as MISSING AND MURDERED INDIGENOUS WOMEN & GIRLS, alongside other charities, in honor of Helen's SPIRIT.

 

             SPIRIT BEAUTY: Not only where you buy, but where you make a difference!
column5: Health & Beauty > Health Care

column3:
Suggested Use

Spray 2-5 times onto your skin and massage the area. Magnesium Topical Spray may feel slightly oily, and an itchy sensation may occur (generally if your body is low in Magnesium) after application, but it is not an oil and will absorb quickly. You may see white residue from around the applied areas; this is just leftover salt that can be wiped off. For a foot soak add 1-2 oz. to warm water and soak feet for 20-30 minutes. 

Caution: Do not apply to open wounds, cuts, or scratches. If burning or irritation occurs, please discontinue use immediately. For external use only.
column5: Health & Beauty

column3:
For feet that hit the pedometer hard - here’s some much-needed TLC - our Peppermint Reviving Pumice Foot Scrub. It buffs away hard skin and dry patches, helping to freshen up active feet and putting tingles in tired toes.

 

Whether you’re pounding the pavements or the treadmill, have you noticed how much of a daily bashing our poor feet get? The flip side of feet is that they’re super-sensitive, home to 200,000 nerve endings - some people report their feet as highly ticklish or erogenous. These sensitive soles are calling out for a rejuvenating peppermint foot scrub!

 

So, we’re celebrating fantastic feet and peppermint for feet with SPIRIT BEAUTY’S foot scrub, enriched with an enlivening combination of peppermint essence oil and exfoliating volcanic rock (Pumice) granules. Our peppermint foot scrub gets to work on the hard skin that builds up on the soles of your feet. Achy feet can be brought back to life with an exfoliating foot scrub - so treat them to a night off in a warm bowl of water with foot scrubs, until they’re feeling rested, rejuvenated, and cared for.

 

NGREDIENTS: Sucrose (Sugar), Aqua (Distilled Water), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis, (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, (Olive M), Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol (and) Salicylic Acid (and) Glycerin (and) Sorbic Acid (Geogard ECT Natural Broad-Spectrum Preservative), Mentha Piperita (Peppermint Essential Oil).

column3:
Fill your home with fumes you trust. Commercial room sprays contain a lot of hidden toxic chemicals that harm your lungs, irritate your skin and are overall not good for your body.

This calming blend of Lavender and Amber will calm your senses. Fill any space in your house with this relaxing and soothing blend. Spray around your room in the air, on curtains, pillows, clothing; anywhere you want this lovely scent. You can use it as often as you want, without any harmful effects.

column3:
Introducing our Luxury Body Yogurt - a luxurious lotion that nourishes your skin with a light and creamy texture that your will most definitely fall in love with! Indulge in a velvety smooth experience that absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling soft and hydrated all day long. Embrace the goodness of Body Yogurt for a truly refreshing and revitalizing skincare routine.

Top: Hibiscus 
Mid: Pink Dragonfruit
Base:  Vanilla

HOW TO USE

Apply after showering and daily as needed. Massage in circular motions until fully absorbed. A little goes a very long way!

 

Star Ingredients:

Shea Butter: 

Shea butter is an excellent hydrating, antioxidant and anti-inflammatory ingredient for softening, nourishing and protecting the skin. It increases moisture retention in the skin, resulting in revitalized


Jojoba Oil:

Rich in monounsaturated fatty acids and easily absorbed, the composition of jojoba oil is structurally similar to natural oils in the skin (sebum), has excellent emollient properties to maintain hydration and smooth your skin.


MCT oil: (Coconut oil)

With its deep hydrating capabilities, anti-inflammatory properties, nutrient-enhancing effects, and antioxidant-rich composition, MCT oil is a star ingredient all on its own!


Panthenol:

Is a humectant meaning it holds and binds water, and these properties mean that it is ideal when it comes to keeping water in the skin. It also works as an emollient which means it can moisturize and soothe the skin, as well as help, protect it from environmental factors and skin stresses. 

Glycerin:

While glycerin is a moisturizing ingredient on its own, it’s even better when paired with other hydration-preserving elements like fellow Panthenol and humectant emollients like plant oils.

Hydrated skin is one of the most straightforward pathways to healthy skin. So with a super-hydrating ingredient like glycerin, you can expect the skin to drink in all that moisture and the visible benefits to go along with it. Glycerin will also help your skin become softer yet stronger by keeping your skin barrier moisturized and protected from environmental irritants.



Ingredients:

Aqua (Water), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (MCT (Coconut) Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba Oil), Cetearyl/Sorbitan Olivate (Olive M), Stearic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol (and) Salicylic Acid (and) Glycerin (and) Sorbic Acid (Eco/Geogard ECT), Tocopheryl Acetate (VitaminE), Panthenol, Parfum (Fragrance Oil).


Always formulated without:

Parabens,  Petroleum, Sulphates, Phthalates.

column5: Health & Beauty

column3:
Smooth away dirt and oil with our relaxing and invigorating face scrub. Our formulation features all-natural Apricot Shells and exceptionally skin-friendly ingredients to gently exfoliate the skin, leaving it soft and radiant without stripping away precious natural oils. With its creamy rich, velvet-like texture SPIRIT BEAUTY’S scrub has been designed to be extremely cleansing, smoothing  and hydrating.

At the core of the apricot scrub’s charm lies its remarkable ability to exfoliate and eliminate dead skin cells. The finely ground apricot kernels, when massaged onto the skin, work as gentle exfoliants, sloughing away the dull and lifeless outer layer. This process not only reveals a fresh, radiant complexion but also encourages cell turnover, promoting healthier skin from within.

Regular exfoliation with natural apricot scrub helps unclog pores, preventing the accumulation of debris that can lead to breakouts and a lackluster appearance. By bidding farewell to dead skin cells, you pave the way for a smoother and more vibrant complexion.

 

Directions: Lather vigorously with water in palm of hand until creamy and foamy. Work gently over wet face or body. Rinse with warm water. Do not get into eyes.

 

Disclaimer: This Natural Apricot Shells face scrub is intended for external use only, avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use immediately and consult your physician.

column3:
Treat your skin to a whipped creamy soap with sugar granules that will exfoliate, cleanse and moisturize all in one wonderful product.

 What is a Foaming Body Polish?

A gentle and creamy soap base made with moisturizing coconut oil which is hand whipped to silky perfection and enhanced with sugar granules for gently sloughing off dead skin cells to reveal soft glowing skin.

 Our formula is free of parabens, phthalates and sulfates. Made with only the best ingredients to nourish your skin while not harming you or the environment. 

DETAILS

Each Sugar Scrub is 10oz and is packaged in a BPA-free, recyclable plastic jar. 

Made is small batches to ensure freshness. Free of parabens, phthalates and is cruelty free.


This generous size jar is perfect for gift giving as bridesmaids gifts, birthdays, new moms, graduation and for anyone who needs a little reminder of how much they are loved.

 

Description

A delightful blend of lavender and anmber aromas intertwine with the gentle fragrance of bergamot.

 Top: Lavender

Middle:  Amber 

Bottom: Bergamot

Notes:

  • Shelf life of 1 year from the time of purchase.
  • No Palm oil, phthalate, sulphate, petroleum and paraben
  • Only ever tested on willing humans
  • 100% vegan
  • For external use only - do not eat

Direction/Uses:

To use  apply desired amount to your palm or loofah and rub in circular motion on wet skin until sugar crystals are dissolved. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Luxury Body Yogurt, Body Butter, or Body Oil from our shop. 

INGREDIENTS: Sucrose (Sugar), Aqua (Distilled Water), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Baby Foam), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Simmondsia (Jojoba Oil), Glycerine, Coco Glucoside, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Sodium Stearyl Lactylate (ECO Cert Emulsifier), Benzyl Alcohol (and) Salicylic Acid (and) Glycerin (and) Sorbic Acid (Eco Cert Preservative), Propandiol, Parfume (Fragrance).

column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Skin Care > Lotions & Moisturizers

column3:
Experience pure decadence...
Natural, plant-based oils and butter whipped into a velvety dream that melts into the skin on contact. 

An intensely moisturizing, soothing gift from nature that melts into the skin on contact…  This luxurious, hand-whipped blend of Shea, Kokum, & Mango Butters, Coconut, Safflower & Rose Hip Olis and other skin-loving ingredients. The combination of these quality ingredients helps your regular skincare routine and has been used to help with skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. Its uses range from facial moisturizer to stretch marks to diaper rash. Indulge in the ultimate skincare experience with our Whipped Body Butter, and treat your skin to the pure, natural goodness it deserves

How To Use
Remember, a little goes a long way! Using a spatula scoop, take a small amount from the jar and place it on your fingers, or use clean, dry hands to scoop. Warm up the product by rubbing your fingers together for a moment and then massage onto your face and body with circular motions. You may use it after a shower on slightly damp skin, throughout the day as needed, focusing on problematic areas or even on the ends of your hair to seal in moisture and help prevent split ends. Use morning and night. Keep in cool, dry area and use within 6-8 months. Do not ingest. Do not get water into the product.

INGREDIENTS:

 Butyrospermum Parkii Fruit (Shea Butter), Mangifera Indica (Mango Butter), Garcinia Indica (Kokum Butter), Helianthus Annuss (Sunflower Oil), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Cathamus Tinctorius (Safflower Oil), Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil (Rose Hip Oil),  Manranta  Arundinacea Root (Arrowroot Powder), Tocopherol (Vitamin E).
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Skin Care > Lotions & Moisturizers

column3:
Our Dry Body Oils are enriched with Jojoba, Apricot, Pomegranate, Rice Bran, and MCT Oils, our body oil delivers deep hydration to leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and rejuvenated.

 

 

Jojoba oil as a skin moisturizer helps to maintain the outer layer of keratin on your skin, and it also helps to keep your skin supple since it is an emollient. Jojoba oil moisturizes your skin without blocking the pores. Since jojoba oil contains the same composition as natural oil, it stops excess oil production and maintains hydration for the skin. This makes it safe for almost all skin types, especially oily skin.

 

Rosehip Oil is cold pressed and contains one of nature’s richest sources of essential fatty acids (Omega 3 & 6), vitamins, and antioxidants. It is a potent anti-aging oil with more vitamin C than an orange or lemon!

 Pomegranate Seed Oil is a light, moisturizing, and nourishing emollient for the skin. It is rich in Vitamin E. Pomegranate Oil is absorbed easily by the skin without leaving a greasy residue.

 

Apricot Oil is a rejuvenating natural oil ideal for softening the appearance of fine lines and restoring a healthy glow to the skin. Rich in essential fatty acids, this gentle oil has excellent restorative properties that promote soft, radiant hair and help to soothe irritated skin

 

 Rice Bran Oil is rich in vitamin B, vitamin E, squalane, fatty acids, and more. It soothes, hydrates, protects the skin, and helps fight the signs of aging.

 

MCT oil has anti-inflammatory properties that can help calm irritated or inflamed skin. It’s beneficial for those with conditions like eczema or psoriasis, as it can reduce redness, itching, and general discomfort, helps improve the skin’s elasticity, and defies wrinkles. These anti-aging benefits stem from its ability to moisturize and improve the skin’s youthfulness.

 

 

 

Made up of a luxurious blend of plant-based oils that nourish and hydrate, this non-greasy, non-comedogenic blend is great at balancing any skin type! It is lightweight, quickly absorbed into the skin, and is perfect for any skin type. The scents keep you smelling, fabulous and fresh all day long. Custom scents and labels are available upon request.

 

    • maintains healthy-looking skin
    • non-greasy body oil that reduces transepidermal water loss and helps retain a fast-absorbing, antioxidant-rich formula 
    • provides all-day 24-hour moisture for dry skin
    • Free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates, mineral oil and petroleum.

 Scent Motes:

 

Top: Peach

Middle: French Vanilla 

Bottom: Papaya

 

 To use:  spray directly on the skin or combine with your favorite moisturizer.  For best results, use after a shower or bath.  

 

INGREDIENTS: Caprylic/capric triglyceride (MCT Oil), Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip Seed Oil), Punica Granatum (Pomegranate Seed Oil), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot Kernal Oil), Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Seed Oil), Parfum, (Phthalate & Paraben Free Fragrance Oil)

Description: Immerse yourself in our version of Brazilian Crush Cheirosa 68, with vibrant notes of Brazilian Jasmine, pink dragonfruit, and sheer vanilla. Feels unexpectedly fresh.

Top: Pink Dragonfruit, Lychee Essence

Mid: Brazilian Jasmine, Ocean Air, Hibiscus

Dry: Sheer Vanilla, Sun Musk

 

Notes:

  • Shelf life of 1 year from the time of purchase.
  • No Palm oil, phthalate, sulphate, petroleum and paraben
  • Only ever tested on willing humans
  • 100% vegan
  • For external use only - do not eat

Direction/Uses:

To use  apply desired amount to your palm or loofah and rub in circular motion on wet skin until sugar crystals are dissolved. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Luxury Body Yogurt, Whipped Body butter, or Body Oil from our shop. 

 

INGREDIENTS: Sucrose (Sugar), Aqua (Distilled Water), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (Baby Foam), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Simmondsia (Jojoba Oil), Glycerine, Coco Glucoside, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Sodium Stearyl Lactylate (ECO Cert Emulsifier), Benzyl Alcohol (and) Salicylic Acid (and) Glycerin (and) Sorbic Acid (Eco Cert Preservative), Propandiol, Parfume (Fragrance).

Treat your skin to a whipped creamy soap with sugar granules that will exfoliate, cleanse and moisturize all in one wonderful product.

 What is a Foaming Body Polish?

A gentle and creamy soap base made with moisturizing coconut oil which is hand whipped to silky perfection and enhanced with sugar granules for gently sloughing off dead skin cells to reveal soft glowing skin.

 Our formula is free of parabens, phthalates and sulfates. Made with only the best ingredients to nourish your skin while not harming you or the environment. 

DETAILS

Each Sugar Scrub is 10oz and is packaged in a BPA-free, recyclable plastic jar. 

Made is small batches to ensure freshness. Free of parabens, phthalates and is cruelty free.


This generous size jar is perfect for gift giving as bridesmaids gifts, birthdays, new moms, graduation and for anyone who needs a little reminder of how much they are loved.

 

Description

A delightful blend of nutty pistachio and almond aromas intertwine with the gentle floral fragrances of heliotrope and jasmine. This decadently warm concoction is grounded in a base of caramel, sandalwood, and vanilla, with a subtle hint of salt adding depth to its vibrant sweetness.

 

Indulge in our version of the popular “Bum Bum fragrance.

  • Top: Pistachio
  • Middle:  Coconut & Tiare
  • Bottom:  Salted Caramel, Vanilla

Notes:

  • Shelf life of 1 year from the time of purchase.
  • No Palm oil, phthalate, sulphate, petroleum and paraben
  • Only ever tested on willing humans
  • 100% vegan
  • For external use only - do not eat

Direction/Uses:

To use  apply desired amount to your palm or loofah and rub in circular motion on wet skin until sugar crystals are dissolved. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Luxury Body Yogurt, Body Butter, or Body Oil from our shop.
